# TextureResource.Dimensions2D

**Structure**

The dimensions of a 2D texture.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Dimensions2D
```

## Overview

This specifies the width and height of a 2D texture.

## Creating the 2D dimensions

- **dimensions(width:height:)**: Specifies the dimensions of the 2D texture.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Specifies the dimensions of the 2D texture.
items.name: dimensions(width:height:)
